Description: Two joined fragments of the neck of a black-figure painted pottery situla. Griffin to left, star in field. Purple on base of wing and alternate feathers.
Curator's comments: The scene was probably a pair of confronting griffins.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 11 (and Pl. GB 597, 17)) (Group C. 25)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 265)
